title: Toolbelt
summaries: The Toolbelt is an accessory item purchased from the Goblin Tinkerer for 10 that increases the range of block placement by one tile, although it does not increase block mining range. The effect stacks with that of the Builder buff, Toolbox, and Extendo Grip or Architect Gizmo Pack.

statistics.Buy: 10
statistics.Sell: 2
